Enable gtkglsink OpenGL sink based on desktop OpenGL API

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
GStreamer plugin for rendering video into a GtkWidget.
Includes the following elements: * gtksink - A video sink that renders to a GtkWidget * gtkglsink - A video sink that renders to a GtkWidget using OpenGL (built only with USE=opengl or USE=gles2)
